org.wtc.eclipse.platform.locators
Class HackableSWTWidgetLocator

Direct Known Subclasses:
HackableSWTWidgetReference
public class HackableSWTWidgetLocator
extends SWTWidgetLocator

An SWTWidgetLocator with a backdoor to specify waitForIdle strategy.
